com.orange.labs.sdk.session

Interface Session

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AuthSession

    public interface Session

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addScope(java.lang.String scope)
      Right to be granted by the user for an Api.

      Returns the current access token

      Returns the App Key

      Returns the App Secret

      Returns the date of expire for access token

      Returns the session scope: scope separated by space

      Refresh a session thanks to refresh token
      void unlink()
      Unlinks the session by removing any stored access token and secret.

      • getHeaders

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getHeaders()

      • addScope

        void addScope(java.lang.String scope)
        Right to be granted by the user for an Api. Each Api can populate scope. For example, Cloud Api add 'cloud' scope.
        Parameters:
        scope - scope for identity populate by an Api.

      • isLinked

        boolean isLinked()
        Returns whether or not this session has a user's access token is still valid.

      • unlink

        void unlink()
        Unlinks the session by removing any stored access token and secret.

      • refresh

        void refresh(OrangeListener.Success<java.lang.String> success,
           OrangeListener.Error failure)
        Refresh a session thanks to refresh token
        Parameters:
        success - Listener called when session has been refreshed
        failure - Listener called when error occurred
